userStories.title: Fix ProductTips tooltip width bug
acceptanceCriteria: Tooltip bubble has reasonable minWidth and maxWidth
Tooltip text wraps properly on small screens
userStories.notes: Added .frame(maxWidth: .infinity) and .fixedSize(horizontal: false, vertical: true) to TipView in RecurringExpensesList.swift. The TipView (Apple TipKit) was rendered without width constraints inside a List Section — maxWidth: .infinity ensures it fills the row, fixedSize(horizontal: false, vertical: true) prevents horizontal scrolling and ensures proper text wrapping on small screens.
